template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the {industry} space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the e-commerce space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.

message.content: Create and launch a researched content campaign across blog, video, and social media to boost Q4 sales, ensuring consistent messaging and tracking engagement metrics.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, the user wants a concise single-sentence prompt for an e-commerce content campaign. The key requirements are: end-to-end task, involving research, multi-format creation, cross-channel consistency, and measurable goals. 

Got to keep it under 45 words in plain English. Let me structure it to cover all elements without being verbose. Maybe start with the action, include the research and creation aspects, mention channels, and end with goals. 

"Create and launch a researched content campaign across blog, video, and social media to boost Q4 sales, ensuring consistent messaging and tracking engagement metrics." That hits research, multi-format (blog/video/social), consistency, and measurable goals (tracking metrics). Word count is 28, fits the limit.
